title: @Riot when you gonna give me my skin i paid for with riven figure?
body: Submitted a ticket 8 days ago still no response... Chose digital unlock when i order championship riven figure all i get are errors....even posted a pic... but yall responded to my other ticket in 2 days ... so just gonna screw me and wait for the digital timer to run out eh?

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and it looks like the ticket has been escalated to a specialist who is reviewing your report.  Our bad for not updating you on the current status!  Hold tight while this situation is being reviewed, and we'll respond as soon as we can!
thank you its just nice to know something instead of feeling forgot about... why i left blizzard games :D
